title: Free alternative to Lighthouse Code Coverage Explorer?
content:
I was trying to find if there is any free tool that allows an output similar to Lighthouse. I want to highlight the code paths taken so that I only reverse engineer the parts that are being executed. Unfortunately, Lighthouse only plugs into IDA Pro and Binary Ninja paid versions.

Perhaps there is a free plugin for Ghidra or radare2/Cutter?

If such a plugin is not available, how can I go about making something like that? What would be the basic building blocks?

answers_data.content:
I found some tools for both the open source software products.

Ghidra:

  • Dragon Dance

  • EMERALD

Cutter:

  • CutterDRcov
